Title: Asobi ni Iku yo!: Asobi ni Oide
Description: ['Catian Eris is now on a mission to learn about Earth games and how they are played, but she seems to think that bets have to be placed every time. And while some bets are material items, eventually the Catians learn about betting items of clothing...']
Related: ['Adaptation: Canvas 2: Nijiiro no Sketch', 'Other: Canvas: Sepia-iro no Motif']
Voices: ['Itou, Kanae', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Tomatsu, Haruka', 'Tamura, Mutsumi', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Kotobuki, Minako']
Staff: [['Ueda, Youichi', 'Director, Storyboard, Key Animation'], ['Itou, Kanae', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Sphere', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Fukunaga, Gen', 'Executive Producer']]
